mean_en: a device that changes the voltage of an electric current
word_etyma: transform变换 + er名词后缀：物 → transformer 变压器，转换器
sentence: You can hear a humming sound coming from the transformers at the power plant.
sentence_trans: 你可以听见发电厂的变压器发出的嗡嗡声。
sentence_phrase: the transformers at the power plant
